static.departments-info: Access department-specific timetables. Search by department or school to find up-to-date lectures and other classes.
static.disclaimer: Disclaimer: While every care has been taken in compiling this timetable, the University is not bound by any errors or omissions. The University reserves the right at any time to cancel, revise, amend or alter timetabling information.
static.error-autosync:
The Auto-Sync is switched off.
Please sync manually or enable the Auto-Sync in the Admin panel
static.error-ip:
The IP provided is invalid.
Please review your input
static.error-ip-blocked: The communication has been closed for security reasons because your IP is flagged in a public blocklist
static.error-no-sync:
No timetable is available.
Please try again later
static.error-admin: You are not authorised to access the Admin panel
static.error-secure-link: The secure link has expired, please generate a new one
static.error-sync:
A sync is already in progress.
Please wait and try again
static.error-unblock-ip: The IP cannot be unblocked because it is listed in a public blocklist
static.exception-ajax-data:
Your request could not be completed because some underlying changes have been detected.
Please try again
static.exception-ajax-infrastructure:
A network error has occurred.
Please try again
static.exception-ajax-unexpected:
An unexpected network error has occurred.
Please try again
static.exception-ajax-unhandled:
An unhandled network exception has occurred.
Please try again
static.exception-ajax-jsonrpc:
An invalid request has been detected.
Please try again
static.exception-jwt-data:
An authentication error has occurred.
Please try again
static.exception-jwt-unexpected:
An unexpected authentication error has occurred.
Please try again
static.information-admin-general-switch: It affects the Lectures, Venues, Departments and Modules timetables for public users and authenticated students
static.information-admin-student-switch: It affects only the Student timetable
static.information-ie:
The browser IE (Internet Explorer) is deprecated and no longer fully supported.
Please upgrade to a current browser to use the application
static.information-masal-interaction-in-progres: Please use the authentication window that is already open
static.information-masal-popup-window-error: Please allow popups (or disable popup-blockers) to authenticate
static.information-no-classes: Tutorial and practical classes may not show. Please contact the relevant academic Department or School
static.information-sync:
The database synchronisation completed.
Please review it
static.lectures-info: Access lecture schedules, designed to help you search for course-specific timetables based on the University's available offerings.
static.maintenance-info:
The application is currently under maintenance.
Please come back later
static.multiple-info: Leave blank to select all records
static.notice-trademark-apple: Apple and Apple logo are trademarks of Apple Inc
static.notice-trademark-google: Google Play and the Google Play logo are trademarks of Google LLC
static.notification-information: Please allow notifications on your device/browser to stay tuned on updates and try again
static.scroll-info: Scroll if the table doesn't fit
static.share-no-active-info: Please note that you cannot share a Draft or Preview timetable
static.student-info: Log in to access your personalised student timetable, reflecting your courses and schedule.
static.success-cache-flush: The cache has been flushed successfully
static.success-cleanup: Raw data has been cleaned up successfully
static.success-publish: The timetable has been published successfully
static.success-rollback: The timetable has been rolled back successfully
static.success-sync-start: The database synchronisation has started and you will get notified once completed successfully
static.success-update: The record has been updated successfully
static.venues-info: Search by location to access up-to-date information on lectures and other classes.
static.watchout-raw: Watch out for raw data... clean up?

dynamic.admin-panel-sub: This panel enables you to manage the OpenTimetable Cloud application settings autonomously. For any technical query, please log an Issue.
dynamic.cookie-information:
Please enable Cookies to use the application.
Only essential Cookies are used.
Visit the Privacy Policy for more information

The database synchronisation failed.
Please log an Issue
